amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to fund the Wood Utilization grant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Wood Utilization grant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A041) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A041) Failed by voice vote.
